## 2024-04-02 Updates for version 3

  - Federal funding data is now sourced from https://fundingmap.fcc.gov/data-download/funding-data.<br/>
    The funding programs currently tracked on the rural broadband service map include:
    - RURAL ECONNECTIVITY PROGRAM
    - Broadband Infrastructure Program
    - Capital Projects Fund
    - State and Local Fiscal Recovery Fund
    - Connect America Fund Phase II
    - Enhanced Alternative Connect America Cost Model
    - RDOF data from https://www.fcc.gov/auction/904 to https://fundingmap.fcc.gov/data-download/funding-data
